TV

Get the channels you really want

Eastlink TV brings you a whole new era of TV freedom. Now you’re in control of the channels in your TV package with features like TV Channel Exchange and Personal Picks, giving you more flexibility and choice than ever before. Find these awesome features in our most popular Bundles and see for yourself why we’re getting two thumbs up all across the country.

Internet + Essentials Plus + Phone

Our most popular Bundle includes faster Unlimited Internet, HD TV, DVR, TV Channel Exchange, and Home Phone loaded with features. Includes all channels from our Essentials TV package, plus even more popular channels like CNN, Peachtree and Space.

Order Online
